    |  continue    |  Continue parsing next rule  |

dual_dst_host.description: Flows are defined by the 5-tuple, fairness is applied first over destination addresses, then over individual flows

dual_src_host.description: Flows are defined by the 5-tuple, fairness is applied first over source addresses, then over individual flows

flow.description: Flows are defined by the entire 5-tuple

host.description: Flows are defined by source-destination host pairs

nat.description: Perform NAT lookup before applying flow-isolation rules

src_host.description: Flows are defined only by source address

triple_isolate.description: Flows are defined by the 5-tuple, fairness is applied over source and destination addresses and also over individual flows (default)

    |----------|---------------|
    |  continue    |  Do not do anything, just continue with the next action in line  |
    |  drop    |  Drop the packet immediately  |
    |  ok    |  Accept the packet  |
    |  reclassify    |  Treat the packet as non-matching to the filter this action is attached to and continue with the next filter in line (if any)  |
